snippet.title: Holua's Arcades - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2303450/Holuas_Arcades/

Get ready to dive back into the pure joy of arcade gaming. Four titles in one single shot!

_ Crescent Moon : A fast horizontal shoot 'em up with five different weapons, multiple directional shot bonuses, and optional pods which assist you across four fighting levels.

_ Don't Mess With RIck : A pulp story for a brawlser featuring a rich combat system made up of combos, clinch, projections, parries, and counterattacks. Fight your way through four stages huge bosses, replicant ninjas, road yard traps, rabid dogs, and ... the fury of your own bloodline!

_ Peng Peng : A single-screen platformer cute game where you can play with a friend too, wiping out monsters and collecting infinite quantities of fruits and sweeties. The game system allows you to solve each round using speed or tactics. Two runs done by different players coming to the same point can gather "extremely" different scores depending on how they approach the game. Cross four different worlds and meet a boss at the end of 10-rounds single world and prepare for a LOT of secret bonuses and special events!

_ Heist Of The Ninja : Directly from an alternative 1983, a single-screen game fully dedicated to the golden era fans! Help Koji the ninja, with his mission by jumping the obstacles, shooting at the enemies, and digging into the environment for the scrolls he needs to steal! For all pro gamers, the scoring system features various secret tactics to quickly accumulate more points and climb the leaderboard in ten scheduled rounds to give everything.
